description:
Nagisa makes chocolate as a Christmas present for Fuji, and she has a chance to give it to him at the Verone Academy student body Christmas party, when he invites her to make a snowman with him. But her chance is ruined again by the dark forces of Dotsu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Couldn`t Be Happier!? Nagisa`s White Christmas
